channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Getting started with AI in SQL Server 2025 on Windows】在Windows上使用SQL Server 2025中的AI入门
item.description: 【Back in the earlier part of the year (February maybe?), I put this tutorial together for our early adopters in the SQL Server 2025 program. It’s a guide for setting up SQL Server 2025 in a Hyper-V VM (I used Windows Server) with Ollama and ngnix as an https proxy. It’s a variation of my […]】回到今年早期（也许是2月？），我将本教程放在SQL Server 2025程序中。这是用于在Hyper-V VM（我使用Windows Server）中设置SQL Server 2025的指南，将Ollama和NGNIX作为HTTPS代理。这是我[…]的变体

item.title: 【Vector Support Public Preview now extended to Azure SQL MI】向量支持公共预览现在扩展到Azure SQL MI
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce that Azure SQL Managed Instance now supports Vector type and functions in public preview. This builds on the momentum from Azure SQL Database, where vector support has been in public preview since December. Check out the detailed announcement 💡 Why Choose Azure SQL Managed Instance for AI-Driven Modernization? Effortless Cloud […]】我们很高兴地宣布，Azure SQL托管实例现在支持公共预览中的向量类型和功能。 这是基于Azure SQL数据库的动力，自12月以来，向量支持一直在公共预览中。查看详细的公告💡为什么为什么选择Ai-Driven现代化的Azure SQL托管实例？轻松的云[…]

item.title: 【Azure SQL Cryptozoology AI Embeddings Lab Now Available!】Azure SQL Cryptozoology AI Embeddings Lab现在可用！
item.description: 【Missed out on MS Build 2025? No worries! Our lab is now available for your exploration. Dive into a unique cryptozoology experience using Azure SQL and Azure AI to uncover intriguing (and true) connections among cryptids worldwide. Curious about who would reign supreme in a battle royal or which regions of the world hold the […]】错过了MS Build 2025？不用担心！我们的实验室现在可以供您探索。使用Azure SQL和Azure AI探索独特的加密学体验，以发现全球隐脚之间的感动（和真实）联系。好奇谁将在皇家战役中统治最高或世界的哪个地区[…]

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB TV – Everything New in Azure Cosmos DB from Microsoft Build 2025】Azure Cosmos DB电视 - Microsoft Build 2025的Azure Cosmos DB中的所有新事物
item.description: 【Microsoft Build 2025 brought major innovations to Azure Cosmos DB, and in Episode 105 of Azure Cosmos DB TV, Principal Program Manager Mark Brown sits down with Kirill Gavrylyuk, Vice President and GM of Azure Cosmos DB, to break it all down. Whether you’re developing AI-native apps, building with MongoDB, or just looking for better […]】Microsoft Build 2025为Azure Cosmos DB带来了重大创新，在Azure Cosmos DB TV的第105集中，首席计划经理Mark Brown与Azure Cosmos DB的副总裁兼GM GM Kirill Gavrylyuk坐下来，以分解所有这些。无论您是开发AI本地应用程序，使用MongoDB构建，还是只是寻找更好的[…]

item.title: 【Go from prompt to playback with Sora from Azure OpenAI in the video playground in Azure AI Foundry】从Azure AI Foundry的视频游乐场中的Azure Openai的Sora提示到播放
item.description: 【The video playground in Azure AI Foundry is a high-fidelity testbed for prototyping with cutting-edge video generation models like Sora from Azure OpenAI. It offers a controlled environment for developers to experiment with prompt structures, evaluate model consistency, and optimize outputs for industry use cases.】Azure AI Foundry中的视频游乐场是用于原型制作的高保真测试床，该型号具有尖端的视频生成模型，例如来自Azure Openai的Sora。它为开发人员提供了一个受控的环境，可以尝试及时结构，评估模型一致性并优化行业用例的产出。

item.title: 【The case of creating new instances when you wanted to use the same one】当您想使用同一实例时创建新实例的情况
item.description: 【C++ language backward compatibility makes legal what you had hoped wasn't.】C ++语言向后兼容，使您希望不是。

item.title: 【Agentic DevOps in action: Reimagining every phase of the developer lifecycle】行动中的代理DevOps：重新构想开发人员生命周期的每个阶段
item.description: 【What if your dev tools could take the first pass at a feature, file a bug report, propose a fix—and deploy it? With Agentic DevOps and GitHub Copilot, they can. Here's how agents will reshape every step of the software development lifecycle.】如果您的开发工具可以在功能上进行第一次通过，请提交错误报告，提出修复并部署它怎么办？使用代理Devops和Github副驾驶，它们可以。这是代理商将如何重塑软件开发生命周期的每个步骤。

item.title: 【Building Multi-Agent AI Apps in Java with Spring AI and Azure Cosmos DB!】使用Spring AI和Azure Cosmos DB构建Java的多代理AI应用程序！
item.description: 【As AI-driven apps become more sophisticated, there’s an increasing need for them to mimic collaborative problem solving – like a team of domain experts working together. Multi-agent apps offer exactly that: collections of specialized agents that cooperate to handle complex tasks. But to make them production-grade, you need more than just clever prompts – you […]】随着AI驱动的应用程序变得越来越复杂，他们越来越需要模仿协作问题解决问题，就像一个团队专家团队一起工作。多代理应用程序提供了：合作处理复杂任务的专门代理的集合。但是要使它们成为生产级，您不仅需要巧妙的提示 - 您[…]

item.title: 【Fine-tune the volume of logs your app produces】微调您的应用程序生成的日志量
item.description: 【Explores the new log sampling feature】探索新的日志采样功能

item.title: 【Code quicker with Azure AI Foundry playgrounds and Visual Studio Code】使用Azure AI Foundry Playgrounds和Visual Studio代码更快地代码
item.description: 【The "Open in VS Code" workflow, part of the Azure AI Foundry extension for Visual Studio Code, accelerates developer velocity by integrating agent or model API endpoints and code samples into a new workspace in VS Code for Web. This feature streamlines the development process, enabling rapid prototyping and deployment with just one click.】Visual Studio代码的Azure AI Foundry扩展的一部分“在VS代码中打开”工作流程，通过将代理或模型API端点和模型API端点和代码示例集成到Web的VS代码中的新工作区中来加速开发人员速度。此功能简化了开发过程，仅一键单击即可快速进行原型制作和部署。
